subtasks.description: Traverse the `experiments/` directory and generate a list of all experiment sub‑directories whose modification time is older than 24 hours (exclude any directory modified today). Output the list to a temporary file `old_experiments.txt`.

subtasks.description: For each path in `old_experiments.txt`, inspect its contents and determine whether it contains useful output. subtasks.acceptance_criteria: `keep_experiments.txt` and `delete_experiments.txt` are created. Every path from `old_experiments.txt` appears in exactly one of the two files. subtasks.description: Delete all experiment directories listed in `delete_experiments.txt`. Ensure the deletion is recursive and handles read‑only files safely. Record the total number of directories removed and the total disk space freed (in bytes).
subtasks.acceptance_criteria: All directories listed in `delete_experiments.txt` are removed from the filesystem. A log entry `prune_report.log` contains lines `Deleted: <count>` and `BytesFreed: <bytes>` reflecting the actual numbers.
